original: I don't know what I'm supposed to do about all this.
translation: 我真不知道该怎么办了。

original: What's up?
translation: 怎么了？

original: I've got bad things coming to me. You better keep your distance too.
translation: 直到现在我的报应都没结束。你最好也离我远点。

original: Not a chance in hell.
translation: 这绝对不可能。

original: Not sure what my parents would think of me fighting for the NCR.
translation: 不知道我的父母会怎么看待我为NCR战斗这件事。

original: Working on your own, you're a lot less effective. I've been there and paid for it.
translation: 单打独斗，你的作用就小多了。我也经历过，为此付出了代价。

original: Seems like either way, there's not much I can do to help anyone.
translation: 看来无论如何，我都没法帮助任何人了。

original: You and I, we're just a couple of problem solvers.
translation: 我看咱们俩简直就是问题克星。

original: Beats waiting till they shoot me first.
translation: 敌人攻击我的时候再反击。

original: I met Carla while I was on leave. She said I looked lost.
translation: 我休假时遇见了卡拉。她说我当时看起来很失落。

original: I was, once. We were pretty young, but I like to think it was love.
translation: 我谈过一次。那时我们都很年轻，但我以为那就是爱情。

original: Listening to her, it could... make you forget.
translation: 听她说话，你...会忘记烦恼。

original: God. I should get used to this, I guess.
translation: 天哪。我想我应该习惯这种感觉了。

original: A different time. A better time.
translation: 不同的时代。更好的时代。

original: Don't worry, not looking to throw punches just yet.
translation: 别担心，我暂时还不想打架。

original: Well, good then. That puts me a little more at ease.
translation: 嗯，那就好。这让我稍微安心了一点。

original: Something tells me hitting you would be a mistake I wouldn't want to repeat.
translation: 有种感觉，揍你是不会有好结果的，我可不想再吃苦头。

original: I get carried away.
translation: 我控制不住。

original: Fancy town... let's hit some bars.
translation: 地方不赖…我们去找间酒吧好了。

original: Why does everyone always say that?
translation: 为什么每个人都这样说？

original: Watch where you step.
translation: 注意脚下。

original: Hey, now. You're gonna have to buy me dinner first.
translation: 嘿，你得先从请我吃晚餐开始。

original: Don't have to tell me twice.
translation: 不用你说第二遍。

original: Still breakin' hearts, I see.
translation: 我看你还没有从悲伤中缓过来吧

original: I already got a head start, but I'll go first anyway.
translation: 虽然我已经拔得头筹了，不过这次我还是先来吧。

original: Who knows, I might even be able to show you a Brotherhood trick or two.
translation: 搞不好我还可以教你几招兄弟会里流传的小技巧呢。

original: So, listen, can I ask you something on the level?
translation: 听着，你能诚实地回答我一些问题吗？

original: All right, dear. If you're really sure.
translation: 好的，亲爱的。听你的话。

original: Where'd you come from?
translation: 你从哪里来？

original: Sometimes grandma forget things she doesn't want to forget, pumpkin.
translation: 奶奶有时会忘记她不想忘记的事，小南瓜。

original: I'm with you.
translation: 我帮你。

original: Leo does the chopping, not you, dearie!
translation: 砍人让利奥来，你别这样，亲爱的！

original: Have you considered that he might be senile?
translation: 你有没有想过他可能已经老糊涂了？

original: You shouldn't say things like that where Leo can hear you, dearie. He doesn't like it.
translation: 你可不能当着利奥的面这么说啊，孩子。这话他不爱听。

original: Okay.
translation: OK。

original: Come over here and give your grandma some sugar!
translation: 快过来，来给奶奶香一个！

original: Uh uh. I don't think so.
translation: 呵呵。这可不行。

original: Grandma's got a present for you!
translation: 奶奶有个礼物要给你！

original: Ooo, do I get a prize if I answer right?
translation: 噢，如果我答对了有奖励吗？

original: Am I stepping on your shoes or something?
translation: 我踩你脚了还是怎么的？

original: Sorry, I get distracted.
translation: 对不起，我走神了。

original: Sure. I know you've got a lot on your mind, what with all that wandering the empty desert wastes.
translation: 当然。我知道你心事重重，毕竟在这空荡荡的沙漠上晃荡了这么久嘛。

original: Aw, you really know how to make a girl feel like a stray cat.
translation: 哦，你还真是会放女生的鸽子啊。

original: You look pretty good, given the circumstances.
translation: 考虑到这种情况，你看起来还不错。

original: That's nice of you to say, but I'm an old man. Not much use to anybody any more.
translation: 您真抬举我，可我已经是个老头子了。不管对谁都很难再派上用场了。

original: I know the odds aren't good, but gotta try.
translation: 我知道前景不乐观，但我必须试试。

original: Thanks, boss.
translation: 谢谢，老大。

original: These old bones aren't much use in hand-to-hand fighting.
translation: 我这把老骨头在肉搏战中派不上什么用场。

original: I like punching things, but sometimes shooting things just has to do.
translation: 我喜欢近战肉搏，不过偶尔也会使枪。

original: Yeah, it beats dying in the Wasteland because you were too slow.
translation: 是的，至少比腿脚不利索死在废土上要强。

original: All right, put 'em up. Let's see what you got.
translation: 好的，来吧。让我看看你有什么本事。

original: Oh, this is not going to be good to me.
translation: 哦，这可不适合我。

original: There was no getting through to him.
translation: 他根本就听不进去。

original: A sad story of good intentions gone bad. In that regard, he's hardly unique.
translation: 一个好心办坏事的悲惨故事。从这一点上说，他和其他人也没什么不同。

original: Elijah wasn't good at face-to-face. But he ran out of time.
translation: 以利亚不善于与人当面说话。但他没时间了。

original: "Knowledge is power," but to what end, I have no idea.
translation: “知识就是力量”，但到底得到了什么，我就不知道了。

original: Some of the old-timers hold grudges against the Brotherhood.
translation: 有些老人对兄弟会心存芥蒂。

original: They're not always the friendliest bunch. But they're hanging by a thread.
translation: 他们有时候确实不近人情。但他们已经命悬一线了。

original: We all draw our water from the same old well.
translation: 我们都是从同一口老井里打水喝的。

original: Family... both the good and the bad.
translation: 家人……有好有坏。

original: We're protecting people. Even if it's from themselves, it's a good cause.
translation: 我们通过避免人们接触科技来保护他们，所以出发点是好的。

original: Very optimistic of you.
translation: 你真乐观。

original: Where's that touch of Old World class?
translation: 旧世界的格调去哪儿了？

original: Not all Followers are "people persons." Besides, someone needs to do research.
translation: 不是所有天启追随者都是“合群的人”。再说，也需要有人搞研究啊。

original: Nobody looks me straight in the eye anymore.
translation: 没人敢再正眼看我了

original: There are worse things happening in the world, right?
translation: 反正这世上什么倒霉事都有，对吧？

original: Yeah, looks that way.
translation: 哼，看来也是。

original: I think you're on the right track.
translation: 我觉得你走的是一条正道。

original: That's a start.
translation: 这是个开始。

original: Goddamn Legion.
translation: 该死的军团。

original: Fighting's not my strong suit, but I'll see what I can do.
translation: 打仗虽然不是我的强项，但我还是尽力而为。

original: You see anyone wearing sports equipment, you just let me know.
translation: 你要是看到有穿运动装备的人，就提醒我。

original: I don't think you need to worry.
translation: 我觉得你不必担心。

original: Why are you here?
translation: 你来这儿做什么？

original: I'm so glad you asked... I'm just a researcher. Not even a particularly good one.
translation: 我很高兴你问了这个问题……我只是个研究员，而且也不是特别优秀的那种。

original: Not my strong suit, but okay.
translation: 虽然不是我的强项，不过没关系。

original: I wasn't always with the Followers, or with the NCR.
translation: 我过去并不是天启追随者或NCR的一员。

original: Sounds like it's gonna be an all-out war with the Legion soon.
translation: 看来要不了多久就要和军团全面开战了。

original: I can't leave now. Caesar has gained too much ground and there's no way we're letting him take Hoover Dam.
translation: 我现在不能离开。凯撒已经占了太多地方，我们绝不会让他占领胡佛大坝。

original: Good.
translation: 好的。

original: Good working with you.
translation: 和你共事很愉快。

original: Raul Alfonso Tejada, former gunslinger, at your service.
translation: 前枪手，劳尔·阿尔弗索·特哈达，随时为您服务。

original: First NCR Recon. It's a sniper battalion. I left.
translation: 第一NCR侦察兵。狙击营。我离开了。

original: Hope you're looking because I don't see so good.
translation: 希望你也在找，我眼神不大好。

original: This crouch-walking is hell on my back.
translation: 这样蹲着前进对我的背可不太好啊。

original: Better that you don't.
translation: 那你还是别明白的好。

original: One day, you'll get old and decrepit like me.
translation: 有一天，你也会像我一样变得年老体弱

original: I don't know. Don't see much point in anything right now, except hunting legionaries.
translation: 我不知道。除了猎杀军团士兵外，现在一切对我来说都没有意义。

original: I want twelve mariachi bands playing at my funeral. A medal might be nice, too.
translation: 我想找12家墨西哥乐队在我的葬礼上演奏。能再有枚闪闪发光的勋章就更好了。

original: This isn't going to end well. But I'm still waiting.
translation: 这不会有什么好结果。但我还是在等。

original: My wife's dead. I should've never gotten close to her.
translation: 我妻子死了。我从一开始就不该接近她。

original: Claudia was dead when I got there. I couldn't do anything except avenge her, just like Rafaela.
translation: 我赶到的时候，克劳迪娅已经死了。我唯一能做的，只有为她报仇，就像当年为拉法拉一样。

original: It's not so easy when you know it's coming for you.
translation: 可当事情找上门的时候，你就不会再这么心安理得了。

original: Maybe. I don't know. All I know is that for all my skill with a pistol, I couldn't help them.
translation: 也许吧。我不知道。但我知道就算我的枪法再好，也救不了他们。

original: That goes both ways. I joined up to kill legionaries. We can do that.
translation: 两方面都是如此。我参军是为了杀军团士兵的。我们能做到

original: Road's not getting any shorter.
translation: 路还长着呢。

original: Ha! If only it was this easy all the time.
translation: 哈！要是一直都这么容易就好了。

original: Whiskey and liquor don't last long around here.
translation: 看来任何酒水在这儿都不会积存太久。

original: You looking for trouble?
translation: 你想找麻烦吗？

original: Not worth our time.
translation: 浪费时间。

original: I left when my tour was up. Had enough of war.
translation: 服役期结束后，我就离开了。我受够了战争

original: NCR tries. It's just that trying doesn't mean a whole lot when you're paying your respects to the dead.
translation: NCR是努力过，可再怎么努力，对那些死去的人也毫无意义。

original: It's a lot of territory to secure.
translation: 有太多的领土需要保卫。

original: And here's the slice of the world where NCR's hands start slipping.
translation: 这里就是NCR最初开始实现野心的地方了。

original: Not much future in the Legion if you don't have a dick.
translation: 要是你不带把的话，那你在军团里的前途可堪忧啊。

original: The Legion's the only thing I want on my mind right now.
translation: 我现在脑子想的只有消灭军团。

original: We'll just need a lot of bullets.
translation: 咱们可得多备些弹药。

original: Got it.
translation: 了解。

original: You wanna do something different?
translation: 你想弄些别的名堂？

original: Don't you worry what will happen to little old me. I'm tougher than I look!
translation: 担心我这老太婆会有什么大碍。我可比看起来要强壮多了！

original: Huh.
translation: 嗯？

original: Be careful, sweetie!
translation: 留心点，小甜心！

original: I don't mind fighting - especially to protect you, dearie - but I don't like guns.
translation: 我也不介意动武，尤其是需要保护你的时候，但我不喜欢用枪。

original: I'm taking the shot. You don't like that, you're on your own.
translation: 我立马开枪。你不喜欢，那我们一拍两散。

original: That's not nice, dear!
translation: 亲爱的，这样可不好！

original: In the field, you hesitate, you die.
translation: 在战场上，你犹豫，你就死了。

original: Aww, someone misses grandma!
translation: 哦，有人想奶奶了！

original: Guess I did.
translation: 恐怕是吧

original: Come here little one, give Grandma Lily some sugar!
translation: 小可爱，快过来，来给莉莉奶奶香一个！

original: If you want. It's not really my thing.
translation: 随你的便吧，其实也不关我的事。

original: I'm a pretty good repairman, or I was before the eyes started to go.
translation: 我是个不错的修理工，至少在我老花眼之前是。

original: No shit? Drink's on me, then.
translation: 真的？那这杯我请了。

original: Yeah, that can't possibly go wrong.
translation: 对，不会出问题的。

original: After a few bottles and the vomiting, it ain't so bad.
translation: 喝上几瓶，吐过几次，就会习惯的。

original: Guess my eyesight isn't the only thing that's going.
translation: 看来我已经不单单是眼神不好了。

original: Might as well be shooting blanks!
translation: 这跟打空包弹差不多！

original: It's not that bad.
translation: 情况也不是那么糟

original: All right, all right.
translation: 好吧，好吧。

original: You betcha.
translation: 我听你的。

original: I'm not one for soft living or soft men. Otherwise, I wouldn't be talking to you right now - on both counts.
translation: 我不是那种过安逸日子的人，也不喜欢娘炮。否则的话，我也不会和你说话了，因为你刚好都不是这两类人。

original: I moved on and decided to hang up the guns for good.
translation: 我重新振作起来，决定永远放下武器。

original: Proud of you.
translation: 我为你感到自豪。

original: Hey, I'm a happy old man.
translation: 嘿，我是个快乐的老头。

original: I think I'm gonna be sick.
translation: 我想我要生病了。

original: I could use a Doctor's Bag if you have any handy.
translation: 如果你有医疗包的话，我急用。

original: And some whiskey, if you don't mind.
translation: 还有一点儿威士忌，希望你不介意。

original: Maybe not in that order, but let's get to it.
translation: 也许并非事事井然，但我们还是应当努力。

original: If you're making to see if I'm an easy lay, I got a caravan shotgun that'll cure that desire right quick.
translation: 如果你把我当成一个随便的女人，我可以立马用我的商队霰弹枪好好治一治你的脑子。

original: Forget I said anything.
translation: 忘了我说的吧。

original: Hmm... I'm starting to remember hearing some rumors about you.
translation: 嗯……我开始记得听到过一些关于你的传言。

original: Oh, did you hear that from a Followers preacher?
translation: 哦，你是从天启追随者那里听来的吗？

original: I'd just prefer less... violent purposes.
translation: 我只是更希望……少一些暴力。

original: Yeah, well, you aren't me, so good-for-fucking-you.
translation: 没错，好吧，不过你不是我，所以去你妈的。

original: The Enclave did a lot of bad things, but there were good people.
translation: 英克雷的确罪行累累，但也有不少好人。

original: Are you out of your fucking mind? NCR's my country, and I support it.
translation: 你脑子进水了？NCR是我的祖国，我支持她。

original: Back in your good graces again? I knew you'd see the light.
translation: 怎么突然又变得如此礼貌了？我就知道你会开窍的。

original: That bear flag doesn't make them bulletproof - not safe, close to it, though.
translation: 那面狗熊旗又不能让他们刀枪不入 - 虽然并不算安全，不过也差不多了。

original: Better than nothing. As long as you don't help out the Legion, anything's better than that.
translation: 总比没有要好。只要你不站到军团那一边，怎样都行。

original: My, how you're grown up.
translation: 天啊，你都长这么大了。

original: Crazy ass.
translation: 混蛋

original: Did you hear something, Leo?
translation: 你听到什么了吗，利奥？

original: Now what...
translation: 现在……

original: Don't be shooting wild here - might set something off.
translation: 别在这里乱开枪，可能会引爆什么东西。

original: Leo's getting more and more agitated, sweetie...
translation: 利奥越来越焦躁了，小甜心...

original: Stop being so... shifty.
translation: 别这么优柔寡断

original: How else could I hear him tell me who to chop?
translation: 不然我怎么知道他要我去砍谁呢？

original: Fine. Forget I asked.
translation: 好吧。就当我没问过。

original: Guess you're a little tougher than I thought... still, looks like you're feeling it.
translation: 看来你的酒量比我想象得要强一些嘛……不过，我猜你也已经有点撑不住了吧。

original: Didn't your mother ever tell you it's polite to help an old lady carry her bags?
translation: 难道你妈妈没告诉你帮助老妇人拿包是很礼貌的一件事吗？

original: Mom was a tribal, she didn't teach me anything like that.
translation: 我妈虽然生在部落，但她从来没教我用过这类东西。

original: Is someone looking for a paddling?
translation: 有人想打架是吗？

original: Caught me good and pissed.
translation: 来的可真是时候。

original: Am I dead? Oh.
translation: 我已经死了吗？哦。

original: Hmm. You really do need some help.
translation: 嗯。你确实需要帮助

original: Any closer and you'd need a Rad-Away.
translation: 再近的话你就需要辐特宁啦。

original: Funny how that works.
translation: 真是个可笑的结果。

original: As the old saying goes, two's company, but three's a small army.
translation: 俗话说，二人作伴，三人添乱。

original: I don't want to slow you down more than I already do.
translation: 我不想再当你的累赘了。

original: I'll leave the fighting to the old warhorses. It's what they were made for.
translation: 我会让那些老将们出马的。毕竟他们都是久经沙场。

original: I heard that.
translation: 我听到了。

original: You need something?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: Did I say something? Sorry. Don't pay any attention to me. Just babbling.
translation: 我刚说什么了？抱歉。别在意。我就是嘟哝两句。

original: When you feel like availing yourself of my centuries of experience, you know where I'll be.
translation: 等你觉得我那积攒了几个世纪的人生经验有用武之地的时候，再来找我也不迟。

original: Huh. I guess I'm lucky that I'm part of the Followers.
translation: 嗯。我觉得能成为天启追随者的一分子真的很幸运。

original: If Super Mutants kidnap us and force us to fix toasters for them, it's on you.
translation: 如果这些超级变种人绑架了我们，还逼我们去修面包机。那可都是你害的。

original: Don't worry, pumpkin, grandma's here to help!
translation: 别怕，小南瓜，奶奶就是来帮你的！

original: Right. Got it.
translation: 好了，了解

original: Do you see them, Leo? I don't see them!
translation: 你发现他们了么，利奥？我找不到！

original: [Sighs.]
translation: [叹息]

original: Sweetie, leave that messy business to Leo.
translation: 甜心，肮脏活交给利奥处理吧。

original: I can throw the gun at 'em if you want.
translation: 如果你同意，我可以扔枪砸他们。

original: Leo says your technique was very good that time!
translation: 利奥说你的技术很高超！

original: I just kept shooting until they were all dead.
translation: 我不停地开火，直到看见他们全都中弹倒地。

original: That will teach them!
translation: 看他们还敢不敢！

original: I never even saw the sun until I was 75 years old.
translation: 到75岁那年，我才第一次见到太阳。

original: Take your time. Not like I'm a decrepit old man who might keel over dead any minute.
translation: 你可以慢慢来。不像我这个老家伙，随时都有可能倒地嗝屁。

original: Grandma will be right here if you need anything, pumpkin!
translation: 如果你需要我的话，记得奶奶就在这儿呢，小南瓜！

original: I wasn't getting any younger or faster.
translation: 我不会变得更年轻、更灵活了。

original: Now now, dearie, there's no need to repeat yourself.
translation: 好了好了，亲爱的，不用再重复了。

original: I'm sorry to inform you that you are, as the locals say, "nuttier than a Bighorner dropping."
translation: 我很抱歉地告诉你，你就像当地人说的“比大角羊的大便还蠢”。

original: You shouldn't be so naughty, pumpkin!
translation: 你不该这么淘气，小南瓜！

original: Please, stop.
translation: 求求你，停下来

original: Grandma's sorry about that. Sometimes she gets mad and listens to Leo when she really shouldn't.
translation: 奶奶很抱歉。有时候我会不由自主发疯，任听利奥摆布，但她真不喜欢那样。

original: Okay, forget I said anything.
translation: 好，忘了我说的话。

original: Do doggies want treats?
translation: 小狗想要糖果吗？

original: [Happy bark.]
translation: [欢快地吠叫.]

original: A doctor and cybernetic dog. We should open an act at the Tops.
